extracted_playbook.title: Check MISP Instance Version
extracted_playbook.description: Verify the version of the running MISP instance to determine if it is affected by CVE-2022-48328 or CVE-2022-48329.

extracted_playbook.title: Update MISP to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the MISP Threat Intelligence and Sharing Platform to the latest version to mitigate vulnerabilities.
